metadata.description: The location of the virtual machines where the run commands will be executed.
Required. The name of the resource group in which to deploy the resources.
Required. The names of the virtual machines on which to run the scripts.
Optional. An array of objects that define the scripts to run. Each object must contain a "name" and "blobNameOrUri" property.
Optional. The name of the storage account where the logs will be stored.
Optional. The name of the container in the storage account where the logs will be stored.
Optional. The resource ID of the user-assigned identity to use for logging.
Optional. The name of the storage account where the scripts are stored.
Optional. The name of the container in the storage account where the scripts are stored.
Optional. The resource ID of the user-assigned identity to use for running the scripts.
Optional. The name of the run command to execute.
Optional. The content of the script to run.
Optional. The URI of the script to run.
Optional. The timeout in seconds for the script execution. Default is 5400 (90 minutes).
Optional. The parameters to pass to the script.
Optional. The name and value of the protected parameter to pass to the script.
Do Not Update. Used to name deployments and logs.

properties.errorBlobUri: [if(empty(parameters('logsContainerUri')), null(), format('{0}/{1}-{2}-error-{3}.log', parameters('logsContainerUri'), parameters('virtualMachineName'), parameters('scripts')[copyIndex()].name, parameters('timeStamp')))]
properties.outputBlobUri: [if(empty(parameters('logsContainerUri')), null(), format('{0}/{1}-{2}-output-{3}.log', parameters('logsContainerUri'), parameters('virtualMachineName'), parameters('scripts')[copyIndex()].name, parameters('timeStamp')))]
